name: The Old Adventurer
description:
An old adventurer where in his youth is called the greatest adventurer, for the last time set on a dangerous journey by himself. His adventurer soul still burning so bright, making him go for a journey where he conquer all and once again be called the greatest adventurer!

Even though he is blind now.....

Help the old adventurer to regain his glory of conquering all terrain, traps and danger!

This is a prototype of a game for My First Game Jam : Summer 2020

[CREDIT]

Art by Ansimuz

https://ansimuz.itch.io/magic-cliffs-environment

Background Music  by David Fesliyan : A Bit Of Hope 

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
